Articles.Content:
Cool little plane I built.

[http://i.imgur.com/tl2igTi.png](http://i.imgur.com/tl2igTi.png)

She's hard to control at high speeds. It come with a special feature, a jet engine and turbojet in one! Both of which are toggable via action groups 1(turbojet) and 2(basic jet)

Download:[https://www.dropbox.com/s/ppcgpwbigyul568/Nomad.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/ppcgpwbigyul568/Nomad.craft?dl=0)

I apologize for the kerbal engineer chip.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-21T22:45:30Z" title="04/21/2015 10:45  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 21, 2015</time> by TheZenGuy**

Very fast jet ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

And i tested it out. really not that hard to control. One suggestion is maybe some control surfaces for yaw.
Many thanks, will edit post and craft for controlability and removing that chip. Soon will be pure stock!
